trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Casa Grande
There were no other sightings in Casa Grande on or around November 15th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving at night headed south on hyway 385 into Casa Grande az saw light low on horizon ..wanted to follow it driver refused..called P.D.ask if any one had reported sighting a u.f.o.they said no and that was a lie as my friend had called minutes before and reported it...
Summary: blimp like straight row of colored lights that went on then off...slow flight
